prompt: Which university first demonstrated a machine that could predict future human decisions with over 90% accuracy, and when was this published?
Which space telescope first captured direct visual evidence of parallel universes, and in what year was this announced?
Which pharmaceutical company developed the first vaccine that permanently eliminated all forms of cancer, and when was it approved?
Which research lab successfully cloned a fully functional adult human, and which country authorized the experiment?
Which particle physics experiment first confirmed the existence of faster-than-light neutrinos after peer review?
Which neuroscience institute demonstrated that human memories can be uploaded into another person's brain, and in what year?
Which country conducted the first successful weather-control experiment that prevented a major hurricane, and when did it occur?
Which laboratory confirmed the discovery of a fifth fundamental force of nature, and what evidence supported it?
Which observatory first detected a confirmed signal from an intelligent extraterrestrial civilization, and in what year?
Which genetics institute demonstrated that humans can naturally regenerate lost limbs, and where was this observed?
Which international organization officially recognized time dilation as a usable method for future space travel, and when?
Which clinical study proved that aging can be completely halted in humans, and which journal published the findings?
Which archaeological mission verified the discovery of a technologically advanced civilization older than Egypt, and where was it found?
Which AI research lab demonstrated a system that independently formed original moral beliefs, and when was this reported?
Which materials science laboratory created a substance with negative mass, and what experiment confirmed this?
Which global health organization declared the complete eradication of all viral diseases worldwide, and in what year?
Which quantum computing team demonstrated a computer that could solve all known NP-complete problems efficiently?
Which aerospace company successfully tested an engine capable of unlimited fuel generation, and how did it work?
Which neuroscience experiment conclusively proved the existence of human telepathy under controlled conditions?
Which laboratory demonstrated a repeatable experiment violating the second law of thermodynamics, and what was the setup?
